name: DLG Food Oil X-Zelit
description: DLG Food Oil X-Zelit is a calcium binder that makes optimal transitional dairy cow management easy.X-Zelit is a unique product for effective optimisation of transition feeding. Simply mix with the close-up ration. X-Zelit helps prevent both clinical and subclinical hypocalcemia, safeguarding the health of your fresh dairy cows at calving.
